scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && PORT=3000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:agent: cd agent && PORT=3001 npm run server:dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:agent
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:agent
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:agent && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:agent
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:agent
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../agent && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules agent/node_modules frontend/.next agent/dist
